attributes.action: make bendy buses make acccordian noises as they go round corners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The undersigned believe bendy buses should be made to make accordian noises when going round cxorners. This follows a popular campaign on social networking site 'facebook', we believe this would greatly benefit the community and increase the popularity of bendy buses. Road rage would also be hilarious

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
